metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36516 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16.11. The mixed IPIDassignment method with the hash-based IPID assignment policy allows anoff-path attacker to inject data into a victim's TCP session or terminatethat session.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
